name: Maruosa
description:
'''Maruosa''' is a Japanese producer of [[breakcore]]/[[cybergrind]] music based in Tokyo, Japan.

He has been invited to festivals around the world, including [[Club transmediale|CTM]] in Germany, [[Glade Festival|Glade]] in the UK, [[SÃ³nar]] in Spain, [[Roskilde Festival|Roskilde]] in Denmark, [[Supersonic Festival (Birmingham)|Supersonic]] in the UK, [[This Is Not Art]]/Electrofringe in Australia, [[South by Southwest|SXSW]] in the USA, [[GOGBOT]] in the Netherlands, and [[Lausanne Underground Film and Music Festival]] in Switzerland.
